title: GTA Vice City TWEAKED! Ultimate Vice City Windows 10 2016
description:
Grand Theft Auto Ultimate Vice City: TWEAKED!





  Introducing Grand Theft Auto Ultimate Vice City: TWEAKED!
  This is a working version of GTA: Vice City with the Ultimate Vice City mod added (credit to original modder/uploader)
  that is fully tested and working on windows 10 pro/home. Credit to original creators/modders of Vice City, i have simply added the Real mod and a few other
  tweaks like CLEO scripts, Car Spawners, Mission selector and many many more.. to set this game off right!

             STEP 1.  Mount/Burn Grand Theft Auto - Vice City.iso and run setup.exe
                      as admin and install Vice City,
                      do a full install and wait until done.

             STEP 2. Open folder called STEP 2 and run ultimatevicecity2.exe and
                     point it to your vice city game installaion directory
                     C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto Vice
                     City or wherever you installed it
                     press install and wait until complete. Repeat this process
                     with ultimatevicecity21.exe (this is an update
                     to ultimate vice city which will correct all vehicle names and
                     also adds a few).
                     
             STEP 3. Simply copy and paste the contents of STEP 3 folder to your
                     vice city game installation 
                     C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto Vice
                     City or wherever you installed it

Note: 
       Look out for GTA:III: TWEAKED! and GTA:San Andreas TWEAKED!
       COMING SOON 2016!!!
